title: please help me ID this serif
author: kvdl

comments.content:
Try [Leitura Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016203459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura/) designed by Dino dos Santos & published by DSType. A set of "equal width fonts" in which the different weights have identical character widths, allowing you to change weight without reformatting the text.  
Don
I believe that's it! Thanks, Don.
